title: FS: 1910 T206 Eddie Collins, P350/25; Raw(1.5-2) $275 (SOLD)

posts.post_title: FS: 1910 T206 Eddie Collins, P350/25; Raw(1.5-2) $275 (SOLD)
posts.post_content:
Raw
Front, corner crease top left; light horizontal crease below top uniform button; light surface crease across the "A"; scan shows "cleanness" of the rest.
Back, small stain above "Cigarette"; tiny paper loss top right; scan shows "cleanness" of the rest.

No marks or flaws; just a nice, old card.

Paypal FF or Venmo.
Free shipping.

First, "I'll take it"  here trumps any negotiations via PM here.
